name.description: The name of the chart to pull.

repository.description: The repository URL where the chart is located. Supports both classic HTTP/S repositories and OCI repositories (using oci:// prefix).

version.description: The version of the chart to pull.

outPath.description: The output path where this specific chart should be extracted to, relative to the main path.

path.description: The path where the charts should be extracted to.

charts.description: A list of charts to pull from repositories.
